body_html:
weights_ may actually go away soon, so I wouldn't rely on it. Please use get_tensor_value instead.

Out of interest, what would you be using it for? We're removing it because we didn't feel it was worth it.

body:
weights_ may actually go away soon, so I wouldn't rely on it. Please use get_tensor_value instead. 

Out of interest, what would you be using it for? We're removing it because we didn't feel it was worth it.
